viager.title: What is Viager?
viager.description: Viager is a unique property sale arrangement with roots in French real estate tradition. You sell your home but retain the right to live in it for life (known as a "life estate"). This structure provides immediate capital while securing your housing needs for as long as you wish to remain in your home.

benefits.title: Financial Benefits
benefits.description: The viager arrangement provides significant financial benefits: an initial lump sum payment (typically 20-40% of property value) followed by guaranteed monthly payments for life. This creates reliable income without the need to move, downsize or manage rental properties, while eliminating property taxes and maintenance costs.

difference.title: The Srenova Difference
difference.description: At Srenova, we modernise the traditional viager concept with transparent terms, fair valuations, and ongoing support. Our innovative approach combines the security of a traditional viager with modern financial protections and flexibility, all managed through our easy-to-use digital platform and dedicated advisers.

peace.title: Peace of Mind
peace.description: Our viager arrangements are legally structured to protect your right to remain in your home for life. Unlike reverse mortgages or equity release schemes, there's no debt accumulation, no interest charges, and no risk of foreclosure. Your monthly payments are guaranteed regardless of market conditions.

testimonial.quote: "Srenova's viager solution allowed us to unlock the value in our home while continuing to live in the property we love. The monthly payments have transformed our retirement, giving us financial freedom without having to move."
testimonial.author: — Margaret & John, Srenova clients since 2021

responses.verification_time: Our verification process typically takes 24-48 hours. During this time, our team reviews your property details, ownership information, and conducts initial assessments to prepare your provisional offer.
responses.documents_needed: At this stage, no additional documents are needed. Once your application is verified, we may request property documentation, proof of ownership, and identification for the next steps in the process.
responses.change_information: You can make changes to your application information if needed. Please contact our support team at support@srenova.com or call our helpline at 0800-123-4567 to request modifications.
responses.financial_benefits: The financial benefits of a viager arrangement include: 1) A substantial initial lump sum payment, 2) Guaranteed monthly income for life, 3) No property taxes or maintenance costs, 4) No risk of debt accumulation, and 5) The ability to remain in your home with complete legal protection.
responses.family_implications: It's important to discuss your viager plans with family members. While the property won't form part of your estate for inheritance, the financial benefits can provide you with more resources to support your family during your lifetime. Many clients find this arrangement beneficial for their overall family financial planning.
